title: The methods change, but the story remains the same - grasping for equality with God
description:
From Sean McDowell’s YouTube channel 
Original video: https://youtu.be/XRhfmzNfmOk

transcript_parts.text: one more question kind of about the
storytelling animal then i want to ask
you some questions that just intersect
with the question of god and just get
reflections on them
at the end of the storytelling animal
you talk about how story is changing
so you describe that there's this

but it's also built into us however it

um

the first time i ever

was completely

realistic
you know i i just
and so then we then we go afterwards and

seemed

um we had had this

so i think of uh

why would you want to stop being god is
